archimate:Node.name: [L1 CTS] Event Distribution Provisioning (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This is provisioning to support a system which recieves a stream of alters, relized the LSST mini broker, and feeds alerts to third party brokers. at the level of testing needed within th ePhase II level on complete test stand. Aee are daraenon Kubernentes resources, and subject to offline availabklity.
